Add Wizard is only available when server connection has been set based on the email address entered in the settings I/O Device registration is currently off. To continue go to „I/O Devices” at %1$s and enable the Device Add Button.
Welcome to the Device Add Wizard which will in an easy and simple way help you to add new device to the system. Press Next to continue. Next START>
Enter password to your WiFi Network named Remember password
Power up your executive device. Configuration mode should be the default mode for the device, confirmed by a status diode flashing as If the device when switched on does not work in the configuration mode, press and hold CONFIG button for at least 5 seconds. Press START to start configuration.
WiFi Network is disabled or it is impossible to read its identifier or name! WiFi Network configuration can not be added! Current WiFi Network Data timeout. WiFi Network Scan timeout! I/O Device connection setting timeout! Device Configuration Completion timeout! Basic WiFi Network return timeout!
